description: This file provides utility functions for date manipulation and filtering within an expense tracker app. It includes functions to get previous and next months, filter items by month, and parse date strings safely.

methods.name: prevMonth
methods.description: Returns the YearMonth representing the previous month of the given input.

methods.name: nextMonth
methods.description: Returns the YearMonth representing the next month of the given input.

methods.name: filterByMonth
methods.description: Filters a list of Item objects to include only those matching the specified YearMonth.

methods.name: parseDateOrNull
methods.description: Attempts to parse a date string in 'YYYY-MM-DD' format into a LocalDate; returns null if parsing fails.
